entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLEAR

SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY

SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING

MOSTLY CLOUDY
